name: LlamaRama
description:
LlamaRama is a two player game where llamas play a game of llama volleyball and the first llama to score 5 points wins. 

Controls:

Brown Llama:
Move left: A
Move Right: D
Headbutt: W
Spit: spacebar

Blonde Llama:
Move left: left arrow
Move Right: right arrow
Headbutt: up arrow
Spit: keypad 0

Restart: R or Enter
Quit: escape key

Credits:

Sound effects - https://www.zapsplat.com/
Music - https://incompetech.com/ (Kevin Macleod)
